content: Arctic News concludes that Global Warming of 10°C (18°F) could take place extremely fast. Extinction of humans may take place within the next 4 years. Let us hope this worst case scenario is wrong. We may have to replace 80% of fossil fuels on an emergency basis! Revolutionary 24/7 solar powered engines are headed for pilot plant production. A converted Ford engine running without fuel proved the concept. Since there is no combustion, the engines can be made of polymers using 3-D printing. Development and pilot plant production need to be accomplished on a 24/7 basis. Major funds to do that are on the horizon. See the website: aesopinstitute.org
